values.description: Allow ECS task to read required secrets
values.name: sonarqube-secrets-read

after.description: Allow ECS task to read required secrets
after.name: sonarqube-secrets-read

db_secret_arn.description: Secrets Manager secret ARN containing DB credentials.

sonarqube_url.description: Convenience URL. If Route53 is configured, this will be the custom domain; otherwise ALB DNS.

description.constant_value: Allow ECS task to read required secrets

acm_certificate_arn.description: ACM certificate ARN for the ALB HTTPS listener. If empty, an HTTP listener on 80 will be created instead.

alb_access_logs_bucket_name.description: S3 bucket name for ALB access logs (required if enable_alb_access_logs=true).

allowed_ingress_cidrs.description: CIDR blocks allowed to access the ALB. Use ["0.0.0.0/0"] for public access (not recommended).

az_count.description: Number of AZs to use (2 recommended).

custom_ca_pem.description: Optional custom CA bundle PEM content to trust internal TLS endpoints. If set, it will be stored in Secrets Manager and mounted into the task.

desired_count.description: ECS service desired count (SonarQube community typically 1).

domain_name.description: Optional Route53 hosted zone domain (e.g., example.com). Leave empty to skip Route53 record creation.

enable_alb_access_logs.description: Enable ALB access logs to S3.

sonarqube_image.description: Container image for SonarQube. Use public image or your ECR image if you build a custom one.

subdomain.description: Subdomain for SonarQube (e.g., sonarqube). Used only if domain_name is set.

terraform_state_bucket_name.description: Optional: create an S3 bucket for Terraform state (for AWS-native backend). Leave empty to skip.
